item.title: Hello world
item.description: Do you remember the first time you learned math in your life? Or history? I do not. But I remember my first steps programming. For self-taught adults like me, each step forward can feel like a great achievement. Each obstacle is in itself a learning opportunity. The idea of ​​this initial series of posts is to tell you about my first steps in the world of programming and give you some tools that can be useful to start.
